content.en: Neural network stability: Researchers are using algorithms to address various research questions related to the stability analysis of neural networks with time-varying delays. The agency of these algorithms is to derive new and improved stability criteria for the networks, which are expressed in terms of linear matrix inequalities (LMIs). These algorithms aim to establish less conservative and more general criteria for checking the stability and asymptotic stability of the neural networks.
content.da: Stabilitet af neurale netværk: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til stabilitetsanalysen af neurale netværk med tidsvarierende forsinkelser. Formålet med disse algoritmer er at udlede nye og forbedrede stabilitetskriterier for netværkene, som udtrykkes i form af lineære matrixuligheder (LMIs). Disse algoritmer sigter mod at etablere mindre konservative og mere generelle kriterier for at kontrollere stabiliteten og den asymptotiske stabilitet af de neurale netværk.
